question: Which district has been selected for the ‘Best Marine District’ award by the Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying?
explanation:
Krishna district of Andhra Pradesh has been selected for the ‘Best Marine District’ award, by the Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying.
Kalahandi of Odisha as Best Inland District and Nagaon of Assam had been declared as Best Hilly and North Eastern District. The award would be presented at the World Fisheries Day 2020 celebrations at New Delhi.
